archimate:Requirement.name: TM.1.5.1: There should be documented standards/procedures for dealing with sophisticated, targeted cyber attacks, at each stage of the cyber attack chain (also known as a cyber kill chain).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
